Kuch Ankahee Bateein
A book by Sudeep Kaur
View on Behance Email

2019
Book Design
Cover Art
So the book is about life, short poem on life, simple problems from the point of view of an outsider, poems of love and of heartbreak.

“I wanted a cover that could just go with the title, Kuch Ankahee Baatein, creating a mystery but at the same time intriguing a passerby into picking up the book”
- Sudeep Kaur
